newsitem.title: USA: Prodigy Advanced buys Collision stake.
newsitem.headline: Prodigy Advanced buys Collision stake.

text.p: Prodigy Advanced Repair Technology Corp said Tuesday it acquired 74.02 percent of outstanding shares of Collision Centers International Inc in a stock exchange valued at approximately $1.3 million.
Collision Centers provides of management services to the collision repair industry.
Prodigy Advanced Repair said its stake in Collision Centers is a step toward building a nationwide network of collision repair centers.
Prodigy Advanced Repair manufactures and markets a second-generation body and frame realignment system.
